alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Price; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:59PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL ASHLAND, NORTHWESTERN PRICE AND EAST CENTRAL SAWYER COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM CDT... At 259 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Butternut, or 11 miles west of Park Falls, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fifield and Phillips. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
